nodes.text: House Elegin was one of the Ancient Houses that ruled the Senex sector. It shared the planet Asmeru with House Vandron.
Drost Elegin was its head in 12 ABY, when he tried to ally with Roganda Ismaren. The Gakfedd and Klagg clans negotiated with Drost to be taken in as bodyguards following the end of the crisis.
